t: Do-It-Yourself Fashion Thrives at the McCall Pattern Company - The New York Times
s: August 2, 2016 - The internet did little to disrupt it. Globalization could not shut it down. But while the McCall Pattern Company, the home-sewing brand founded in 1863, may seem like a business that time forgot, it finds itself newly fashionable.
